title: Department of Error
abstract:
Silverstein WK, Stroud L, Cleghorn GE, Leis JA.
First imported case of 2019 novel coronavirus in
Canada, presenting as mild pneumonia. Lancet
2020; 395: 734—In this Clinical Picture,
the last sentence should have read: “Further,
it suggests that the identification of
individuals—like our patient—who could be
managed by being isolated at home, rather
than in hospital, might be an important
strategy for containing this outbreak.”
This correction has been made to the online
version as of Feb 27, 2020, and the printed
version is correct.
text: Silverstein WK, Stroud L, Cleghorn GE, Leis JA.First imported case of 2019 novel coronavirus inCanada, presenting as mild pneumonia.
